main event: A bright light in straight flight with yellow trails was observed and then disappeared in mid-air.
interesting points: The event lasted less than 2 minutes., The sighting occurred on January 15, 1954., The observer described the light as being like an aircraft with its motors cut out., It was suggested that the object could be a meteor (bolide)., Another sighting occurred later on January 20, 1954, by two witnesses at the same location.
sighted object: a bright light with yellow trails
witness description: Miss S.M. and Mr. J.M. from Mallala
